text: Midzuki ga sugitanaraba, tashinkyo to o mitsuke shidai koroshi, matawa kore o horyo ni shi, kokin shi, mata subete no keiryaku (o junbi shite) kore o machibuse yo. Daga kare-ra ga kaigo shite, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o surunaraba, kare-ra no tame ni michi o ake. Hontoni arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukai kata de ara reru
